channel.title: Error with Compile.bat - System cannot find file
channel.description:
This may seem like a simple thing to fix.. but its not. Both files are seemingly in the right spot. File names match but still this comes up. This is what my compile.bat looks like:
@echo off title yourseverhere "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\java.exe" server pause

item.title: Error with Compile.bat - System cannot find file

yah go to my computer then local disc C then program files then java then look for the highest _## and put that in!

item.title: Error with Compile.bat - System cannot find file
item.dc:creator: @Iron Iron
item.description:
@Iron wrote:

This may seem like a simple thing to fix… but its not.
Both files are seemingly in the right spot. File names match but still this comes up. This is what my compile.bat looks like:

@echo off
title yourseverhere
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\java.exe” server
pause
